{"id":833745822,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1667187640,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"37 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/833745822/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Toeplitz Matrix","memory":"17.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isToeplitzMatrix(vector<vector<int>>& matrix) {\n        int m = matrix.size(), n = matrix[0].size();\n        for(int i=0; i<n; i++){\n            int st_x = 0, st_y = i; \n            int num = matrix[st_x][st_y];\n            while(true){\n                if(matrix[st_x][st_y] != num) return false;\n                st_x++, st_y++;\n                if(st_x >= m || st_y >= n) break;\n            }\n        }\n\n        for(int i=1; i<m; i++){\n            int st_x = i, st_y = 0;\n            int num = matrix[st_x][st_y];\n            while(true){\n                if(matrix[st_x][st_y] != num) return false;\n                st_x++, st_y++;\n                if(st_x >= m || st_y >= n) break;\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"toeplitz-matrix","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
